original_title: Je règle mon pas sur le pas de mon père
overview: Sauveur (Savior) needs someone to save him, and so he begins to look for his father, a fast- talking ladies' man. The son becomes attached to his misanthropic father, and soon a crippled woman photographer and a gigolo with a killer smile also enter the scene, and the situation becomes more and more impossible.
title: Je règle mon pas sur le pas de mon père
